topic.question: 1. I will allow my son to go to town. What will I do?
2. What number is between 15 and 17?
3. This pencil is like that one.
4. You can store food in a refrigerator.
option: Food may be bought a store.
Food may be kept in a refrigerator.
You can buy it at the food store.

topic.question: 5. Jim went to town yesterday with his friend to buy a pair of shoes. Where did he go?
6. Henry went to the snack bar. Why did he go there?
option: He went there to play games.

topic.question: 7. Jim wants to clean up. What does he want to do?
8. He was a passenger on that bus.
9. This machine is automatic.
option: It is a part of a car.

topic.question: 10. Tom said, "This shirt cost ten ninety-eight." What was Tom talking about?

11. Rose Allen broke her mirror. 
She couldn't _______.
12. These two wires should not come in contact with each other.
option: They are not the same size.

topic.question: 13. Lt. Small said, "I left as soon as the meeting broke up." When did he leave?
option: at the start of the meeting

topic.question: 14. Albert quit working after sunset. When did Albert stop?
15. John and Mary had an argument. What did they have?
16. Tom said that the classroom was available. What did Tom say about the classroom?
17. Mr. Jones tried out the car on the highway. What did he do?
18. Tom isn't in the class because he has been sick for two weeks.
option: Tom has been in class for two weeks.

topic.question: 19. Tom told the clerk, "I want a pack of cigarettes."
option: James wants to see some cigarettes.
James saw some cigarettes in a package.

topic.question: 20. That street is very straight.
21. Lt. Lee sent his sister a letter.
option: His sister gave him a letter.

topic.question: 22. Corporal Harris has great respect for his officers.
option: He has great trouble working with them.
He has a high regard for them.

topic.question: 23. You should never skip class.
option: You shouldn't be in class today.
You should never go to class.

topic.question: 24. Stick to your studies.
25. John will entertain the visitors.
option: John will turn away the visitors.

topic.question:
26. Tom said, "These apples are spoiled." What did he say
about the apples?
27. The dust is all over the room. Where is the dust?
option: There's no dust in the room.
There's dust everywhere in the room.
There's only a little dust in the room

topic.question: 28. Ted collected the students' papers in sequence.
option: He collected them in a box.

topic.question: 29. Bill and David want to take a walk after dinner. What do they want to do after dinner?
option: walk from the BQQ to class

topic.question: 30. The instructor said, 'I can hardly hear you." What did the instructor mean?
option: You are not speaking loud enough.

topic.question: 31. Can you start a fire with two stones?
option: Can you make the fire hotter?
Can you light a fire with the stones?
Can the heat burn the stones?

topic.question: 32. They walk through a dense forest. What kind of forest was it?
option: There were many trees close together.
It was high up in the mountains.
It was far away from everything.
There were few animals living there.

topic.question: 33. Joe doesn't like to go to the movies alone.
option: Joe prefers going to the movies by himself.
Joe wants company when he goes to the movies.
Joe doesn't like to go to long movies.

topic.question: 34. These shoes are worn out. What should I do with them?
35. The meat was too rare.
36. She will be thirsty when she comes home.
37. John usually goes to bed at 11 o'clock.
option: He normally goes to bed at eleven.
He always goes to bed at eleven.
He never goes to bed at eleven.
He seldom goes to bed at eleven.

topic.question: 38. It takes 15 minutes to record the tape.
option: The recording will start in 15 minutes.
The tape speed is 15 feet per minute.
The tape recorder can be used in 15 minutes.

topic.question: 39. The weather report indicates no precipitation for today.
option: There will be no clouds today.

topic.question: 40. Mrs. Conner furnished all the food for the graduation party.
41. I saw the man sinking.
42. Today's lecture ought to be heard by everybody.
option: Everybody has heard the lecture today.
The lecture will be delivered by everybody.

topic.question: 43. The supermarket is out of fruit.
option: There is a lot of fruit.

topic.question: 44. What is the function of this switch?
option: It's only a very small part.
It's used only once a day.
It's used to turn on the motor.

topic.question: 45. The plane is approaching the airport.
option: It is getting closer to the airport.
It is taking off from the airport.

topic.question: 46. The doctor wants to check John's pulse. What does the doctor want to check?
47. Tom will lend you some money.
option: Tom needs to borrow some money.
You can borrow money from Tom.
Tom will send for some money.
Tom left his money in the bank.

topic.question: 48. Mrs. Smith didn't meet the captain.
option: She doesn't want to see him.
She doesn't want to wait for him.

topic.question: 49. How long does it take to go from San Antonia to Chicago?
option: by bus, car, train, or plane
It's a long distance between them.
about a day and a half by car.

topic.question: 50. Be sure you watch carefully before you drive onto the highway.
option: Be sure to look at your watch.
Be sure to get off the road.
Be sure to take care of the car.

topic.question: 51. The soldier worked in transportation and supply. What did his job involved?
52. Harry was told to attend the class. What did he have to do?
53. Why did the welder use goggles?
54. The enemy gave up to the superior forces. What did the enemy do?
55. The medicine is for external use.
option: The medicine is not meant to be eaten.
The medicine is not meant to be used often.
Only a doctor can prescribe the medicine.
The medicine has a bad odor.

topic.question: 56. Ted said he would have a bit more. How much did he want?

57. W: What did you buy?
M: Some clothes.
Q: What did the man buy?

58. W: Why are you going away?
M: For recreation.
Q: Why is the man going away?
option: to take care of some business

topic.question:
59. W: Are you going to give that book away?
M: No, I want to sell it.
Q: What did the man say?
option: He wants to keep the book.
He wants to give the book to someone.
He wants to return the book.
He wants to get money for the book.

topic.question:
60. M: Where can I buy a money order?
W: Down at the post office.
Q: What did the man want to buy?

61. W: What does Billy want?
M: A blanket.
Q: Why does Billy want a blanket?

62. W: George doesn't know when the plane leaves.
M: Neither do I.
Q: What does the man say?
option: He won't leave on the plane.
He doesn't know when it leaves.

topic.question:
63. W: What caused the engine to fail?
M: It fails because of poor maintenance.
0: What did the man blame the failure on?

64. M: What do you want to know?
W: The purpose of all this.
Q: What does the woman want to know?
option: She wants to know the cost.
She wants to know the cause.
She wants to know the answer.
She wants to know the reason.

topic.question:
65. M: Can you meet me at the restaurant, Mary?
W: Yes. It is a very convenient place.
Q: Why will they meet at the restaurant?
option: Mary can go there very easily.
It's a good place to eat.
Mary has never been there before.

topic.question:
66. M: Where is everybody?
W: Oh, didn't you know? The meeting occurred yesterday.
Q: What did the woman say about the meeting?
option: It took place the day before.
It was planned the day before.
It was not cancelled the day before.
It did not end the day before.
